p: To assess the contents of free amino acids, a sample (1 g) dissolved in methanol (20 mL) was stirred for 10 min and centrifuged at 3000 rpm for 20 min. The supernatant was then dissolved in 25 mL of the sample dilution buffer and after an addition of sulfosalicylic acid (20 mL), the sample was incubated at 4 °C for an hour. The sample was centrifuged at 3000 rpm for 20 min and then filtered with a 0.2 μm membrane filter. The free amino acids were quantified by an automated amino acid analyzer (L-8900, Hitachi High Tech) [ 26].
